parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: The use of nature’s phyllotactic patterns to inform the layout of hierarchical data. These naturally occurring patterns provide a non-overlapping, optimal packing when the total number of nodes is not known a priori.

parameter.name: Reference
parameter.defaultValue: Petra Neumann, M. Sheelagh T. Carpendale and Anand Agarawala. PhylloTrees: Phyllotactic Patterns for Tree Layout. In Proceedings of Eurographics / IEEE VGTC Symposium on Visualization (EuroVis 2006, 8 – 10 May 2006, Lisbon, Portugal). Eurographics, pages 59-66, 2006.
